pronunciation.pinyin: shuǐ néng zài zhōu , yì néng fù zhōu
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shui3 neng2 zai4 zhou1 , yi4 neng2 fu4 zhou1

meanings.value: water may keep the boat afloat but may also sink it (proverb)
fig. the people can support a regime or overturn it
if sth is used properly, one can benefit from it, otherwise it can do harm
